articles.title: Nova Scotians 60-64 now eligible for Pfizer, Moderna vaccines - CBC.ca
articles.description: Starting Monday, Nova Scotians aged 60 and up are eligible for Pfizer-BioNTech and Moderna vaccines. Previously, those brands were restricted to 65 and up.
articles.content:
Nova Scotians aged 60 to 64 are now eligible for both the Pfizer-BioNTech and Moderna COVID-19 vaccines.
